issues.code:

when green flag clicked
if <touching (mouse-pointer v) ?> then
move (10) steps:: #ff0000 // ⇦  🐛   
stop [all v]
end
[/scratchblocks]
issues.name: Missing Initialization
issues.hint: [b]Problem:[/b] [newLine] In this sprite, the variable attribute "position" is not initialized before it is used for the first time. Its value will be the same as at the end of the last execution. [newLine] [newLine] [b]Suggestion for code improvement:[/b] [newLine] Initialize the variable attribute "position" by assigning the desired value at the beginning of a [bc]suitable script[/bc].

issues.name: Missing Loop
issues.hint: [b]Problem:[/b] [newLine] The condition is checked only once. [newLine] [newLine] [b]Suggestion for code improvement:[/b] [newLine] Wrap the conditional statement in a [sbi]forever[/sbi] block, in order to continuously check the condition.

issues.name: Sprite Naming
issues.hint: [b]Problem:[/b] [newLine] The sprite Figur1 does not have a meaningful name, but uses the default name. This makes your program hard to understand. [newLine] [newLine] [b]Suggestion for code improvement:[/b] [newLine] Give your sprites meaningful and unique names.

issues.name: Parallelisation of Different Scripts
issues.hint: Great! At least two scripts are triggered by the same event. This means you are using the concept of parallelization.
